title: Mi 4X 108 cm (43 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV

product_specification.In The Box: LED TV 1U, Manual & Warranty Card 1U, Screws 4U, Remote Control 1U, Stand 2U
product_specification.Other Video Features: Dynamic Noise reduction, Color Temperature Control, 5 Picture Mode (Standard, Movie, Vivid, Sport, Custom)
product_specification.Content Providers: Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+Hotstar, Zee5, Jio Cinema, Youtube, Voot, AltBalaji, ErosNow, SunNXT, Hungama Play, Sony LIV, Hooq, Epic ON, Republic TV, ABP Live, Bloomberg Quint, Hoichoi, ShemaroMe, DocuBay, MX Player, Lattu Kids
product_specification.Content Languages: Marathi, Gujarati, Sinhala, Kannada, Tamil, Rajasthani, Hindi, English, Punjabi, Telugu, Bengali, Urdu, Malayalam, Bhojpuri, Oriya
product_specification.System Languages: Assamese, Marathi, Gujarati, Kannada, Tamil, English, Hindi, Punjabi, Bengali, Telugu, Urdu, Malayalam, Oriya
product_specification.Other Internet Features: PatchWall 3.0, Android TV 9.0, Google Play Store with 5000+ apps, Chromecast built-in, Google Assistant, LIVE TV Channels, 20+ content partners
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: SPDIF, Bluetooth Version - 4.2, Ultra Bright UHD Display, Patchwall, Google Voice Button in Remote, Technical Superiority with VP9-10 Codec for 4K Videos
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on TV, 2 years on Panel, 6 Months on Accessories
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Physical Damages after Usage, Scratches on Panel
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: 1. Covered Under Standard Installation - Table Mounting Using Standard Stand Supplied as Accessory with TV - Extra Charges are Applicable for Wall Mounts as, Rs. 399 for 32 inch Display Size and Rs. 499 for >32 inch Display Size - Connecting with Available Power Source (within 1 Meter) - Connecting / Setting Up Various Available Input Source for Audio Video Based on Model - Connecting with Available WiFi (for Smart TV) - Checking TV for Proper Functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its Features

product_description.Display: It features a 4K display panel with HDR10 support, which can accentuate your viewing experience by letting you enjoy content in high-quality. Also, thanks to the Vivid Picture Engine, the colours which are displayed are accurate and vibrant. This even helps to recreate life-like images. The rich colours, along with the optimal contrast levels, ensure that you have a good viewing experience.
product_description.PatchWall 3.0: It is equipped with PatchWall 3.0, which acts like a one-stop-destination for a variety of video content. You can enjoy watching content in 4K display from more than 20 plus apps (content partners) such as Netflix, Disney+ Hotstar, YouTube, and more. It even includes features such as new animations, one-click play, etc., under the hood improvements.

review:
PROs
1) great picture quality for this price.
2) it supports almost all formats.
3) sound is good.
4) borders are thin, design is simply elegant. even logo is not irritating eyes.
5) User Interface is simpler because of android.
6) Patchwall 2.0 is quite useful after some use.
7) connectivity to internet and phone is simple and reliable.
8) Powercable is long enough and of good quality.
9) Voice operations are more accurate than before.
10) More Settings and many Modes for pictures are given.
98% value for money.. 😎 just buy it and experience yourself.

CONs:
1) I could give 5 stars if all slots like usb, hdmi etc given near to the edge.. they all are given in center. so if you are wall mounting it, its difficult and unsafe to reach there. (you can use usb extender)
2) When you are using internet, like YouTube or anything else and if your connection is disconnected in middle of usage, TV will hang. sometimes it is only option to Poweroff it.
3) It is very big and thin in size. it is good, but if you have children then it is unsafe to keep it on table mount.
4) Remote Doesn't come with rechargable inbuilt battery like One plus remote, it requires AAA batteries.
5) Remote is lightweight, but not feels like premium and for rough usage.
6) though it is advisable to use wall mount for this tv, cleaning in backside is headache after some time.
7) if you are using set top box, and your speakers are connected to set top box, than the sound and pictures on tv compared to sound of speaker may be lagging.
8) starting time is little long.

These all CONs can be ignored because of its low price and good quality, but company can fix it easily.

The best LED TV you can get at cheaper price
Clearity and connecticity is excellent

After 20+ days of usage.. 4.5/5
Picture quality_- good enough for daily use like TV series, news, serials n all..
Sound.. Soo Loud
Connectivity_-didn't face any problem with WiFi connectivity
Chromecast.. don't know why people are not able to connect it properly mine works perfectly fine..
bit of a problem in remote cause of Bluetooth connectivity but after few try it'll work fine..
YouTube also works fine didn't face any problem like picture and sound delay.. I even watch 4k on YouTube it play smoothly..
Pendrive connectivity is also good I even watched End Game in 4k quality is by far best

Great picture quality at affordable price, sound quality is an outlier in otherwise perfect product.

I'm really impressed with the specifications and price. tested and amazed with picture quality as well. interface is smooth and easy to hands-on.

app references are given but you have to download all of them as you wish.

cons: one and only disappointment. Sound.
.sound quality is below par
. equalisation definitely has some issue, you need to have remote in hand all the time to control ever changing high and low dBs from dialogues to songs in movie/series.
.sound clarity is okayish.

#Cant ask for a better product at such price range.

hope a patch will come for the sound asap.

As many people have commented in their reviews, the wifi issue is quite serious. Tried out many options available on internet to get it fixed, but no success. If a smart tv cannot have its wifi working properly, then in no means it can be called a smart tv. This is absolute failure of an MI TV. I have the fire tv stick from an year back, which works like a charm on the same wifi connection.

EXCELLENT LED TV FOR MI BUDGET AND BEST
VALUE FOR MONEY
IT'S GREAT PERFORMANCE
FULLY SATISFACTION
VERY GOOD SERVICE BY FLIPKART AND JEEVES INSTALLATION SERVICE

Its a great bang for buck TV.

Pros:
-- 4K panel is great. You can clearly notice difference between full HD and 4K when you're closer or using it as a monitor.

-- Performance is good enough. Better than Firestick in many instances. Worse in case of prime video (which is expected). Startup takes about 30 seconds which is fine for a smart TV.


-- Ability to use default android TV interface instead of MI skin

-- Decent set of ports. Glad it also includes a 3.5mm headphone port which many TV ignore these days.

-- Lightweight and slim remote

**********
Cons
-- Desperately needs sound leveling. Action scenes in movies and dialogues have a huge difference in db levels.

-- Stand is made of plastic not metal

-- Remote should have a mute button

-- Package didn't include 2 AAA cells for the remote, but what the heck its just nitpicking.

Its a great TV. Buy it if you're looking for a good TV at a very cheap price. Do not buy older MI 4A or 4X pro because it just has 1GB RAM which will not provide decent performance. Go with MI 4X only.

Wonderful Picture, Sound quality. UI is also full of features and easily operable. Much Much better than OnePlus TV as that one is overpriced. All the Features are same except Speaker. Oneplus has 50watt speaker while Mi has 2 10 watt speakers, which is having enough sound quality.
You can get feature of patchwall 2.0 in MI which isn't in OnePlus. It is also consuming less data than anyother tv.

MI LED 4X 43 IS A BEAST...!!

PICTURE QUALITY WAS VERY SHARP AND CLEAR.... I'M VERY IMPRESSED BY THE PICTURE QUALITY OF THIS MI LED ..

ANOTHER THING IS THE SOUND QUALITY IT'S OUTSTANDING...SOUND QUALITY WAS VERY GOOD....OF THIS....!!!

I'M VERY HAPPY TO BUY THIS PRODUCT..

after using 15 days giving review . This is A1 product from Mi .
everything is Excellent . on this range I love it this is my first led smart android tv . I love Mi
picture quality ~ Excellent
audio ~ very good

product is very good love the product

Fully satisfied with the product... picture quality is awesome, connectivity is quick and nice, sound is good enough for a living room. Excellent 5* product within that price bracket for the kind of features it has.

A bit disappointed with the delivery timeline as it took 2-3 days more than what i have expected but the installation was quick.

One of the best decisions I've made. As a LG user I was not sure if the Mi 4x would live up to it's promises but I am glad to say it's a beast. The picture quality is crisp and 4k videos play flawlessly. Android interface provides an ease of use. The new look of patchwall is refreshing and is loaded with tons of content. Both Netflix & Prime Videos work flawlessly on this smart tv. I've read a few negative comments about connectivity but as far as I've used the feature - it works well. The Bluetooth remote is very responsive and so is the Google voice assistant. The only let down(though not a deal breaker) is the sound quality. I believe the speakers are placed in such a way(at the bottom) that it would work well on a tabletop but not on wall mount. Having said that, the sound quality is not bad. At this price range you couldn't have asked for more. I am really loving it.

the picture quality is good. for first timers . the screen is so friggin huge. make sure you use it froma distance

Hello people, please DO NOT BUY THIS TV and save yourselves.
1) WiFi connectivity issues. Though it says connected, it retains only for 10-15 mins and gets disconnected by itself. You will be fed up of rebooting your TV every 15 mins.
2) Cast DOES NOT work. I am using a MI mobile itself. Casting hangs the TV every 5 mins.
3) Buy any other TV and do yourself a favor. Just because this has Netflix and Prime inbuilt, DO NOT buy it. You can anytime buy a Firestick but do not make a hole in your pocket buying this TV.

What kinda smart TV is this with no Wifi grasping power, rebooting itself every 15 mins, Casting mobile to TV hangs the TV FOREVER.

Long story short, DO NOT BUY THIS TV.

MI has not provided any kind of fix or update yet. I am not sure if they even know there are issues. I am not sure if they even have testers in their company.

Total disappointed. Reiterating, DO NOT BUY!

Thanks a ton, Flipkart for your professional help.
Worth buying product, love it, much better that all other brands. Will recommend to my friends and relatives aswell.

Display quality superb, build quality good and the connectivity is amazing 4k gets easily loaded only the sound is little low. It is a value for money 4K TV. Everything that is available in a smart TV of price 40 thousand and above is available in this tv. Only drawback is chromecast connection is little slow compared to samsung smart connect. Had used a sony and samsung tv earlier. Picture quality n sound is best in sony but it is expensive. Samsung is cheaper but led panel got complaint by 4 yr. Very much satisfied by MI TV

I purchased this Mi TV 55 inch from flipkart after searching for best 4K Android TV under 45000 rupees. After using it for few days now I can say that Xiaomi is providing best value for money smart Android TV with great display and sound quality. Even its service is very fast. I am loving this Android TV with lots of useful features like bluetooth, wifi, google assistant, all major apps support. 55 inch is perfect size for a ideal living room and I am very happy by the service and offers provided by flipkart.

I recently purchase this 4K Ultra HD Mi Smart Android LED TV from flipkart and after using it for a while now I can say that this is the best value for money product from Xiaomi. Picture quality and sound output both are excellent at this price segment.

wifi and bluetooth connectivity


Cons :-

At last I want to conclude my review by saying that I am very happy with product and Thanks to flipkart for super quick delivery and installation.
Fast connectivity. Very easy interface. Nice picture quality and decent sound. Best tv under 25k!

I bought the 65 inch 4k panel. The android interface is good and fast while the picture quality is amazing. If you go for a 65 inch model be sure to get tilt-able wall mount. Very happy with my purchase but wouldn't recommend now as we are boycotting Chinese manufacturers.

i never thought you can get a 65inch tv so good for this price. i have a samsung 75inch which is for 4 times the price of this and you would not be able to make out the difference after some time. not much. althought we did recieve the tv one day late but forgiven. if you have a budget for Rs 60000 the go for this tv. personally gurantee, you will love it.

The TV in overall package is really great however the modem that is inbuilt for WIFI connection to be established is not upto the expectation which results in the content being buffered on the TV despite other devices work well with the WIFI connection and show great speeds on them as well. The only thing that i am not happy about is Flipkart itself for the delivery being so slow and unpredictable. TV is great for now until i plan for a big one..lol..
best of best TV in this range Android TV with UHD it full marks to mi & flipkart service with 3 extended warranty & Jeeves best installations all gets full marks & 5 stars

at this price this product is very good. only problem is the Chromecast feature doesn't work without a network ... there should have been a wifi direct connection like wireless display.
Update after 6 month of usage

3. Slim profile
4. Good display

The quality of tv is so good at this price. Yes it is a 4k tv that has a good viewing experience. The only thing you should upgrade is your wifi router for 4k streaming. If the wifi router has 150mbps of speed then you cannot play a 4k video in this tv. A speed of atleast 300 - 600mbps of router will give you an amazing experience.
(The speed iam talking about is not internet speed, the router speed - router capacity of transferring data)
.
.
Over all this TV is fabulous at this price range.
Enjoy! Cheers!

Bought this smart TV on the first week of March and now I'm reviewing this in August. 4K panel is awesome and works flawless when I'm connecting it to my PC...but that's it. WiFi is a pain to connect. When I watch YouTube and Netflix and some videos on the apps, it keeps on buffering and will let me log out of the app which is really weird because I have a 70Mps plan and it works flawless on my other devices. I thought an update will fix this issue but it never has. Really disappointed with the TV. I'm just holding to it because I can connect it to my PC.

Product is good overall in this budget. I do not see any color bleed and it seems LG panel is making quite an impact on this model. It's real eye candy to watch 4k and full hd is so good to watch on such a huge screen! Sound is enough for drawing room; in fact just enough for normal news and serial watching. If you want to make it a home theater, then Boat Avante 2000 160w is a killer deal and I'm surprised to see that an under 10k sound bar can give such a run for money to costly siblings. However, following features must be addressed by MI in their next OT update for this TV:

1- No quick way to change the sound output. Every time you have to quit watching to access settings, change the output and come back launch the program again
2- Pixel UI sometimes crashes. More testing is needed. I found a way to correct it whenever it conks. Just change the theme from light to dark and vizaviz
3- Data Saver option always resets back to ON after restarting the TV. It's annoying when I have a dedicated broadband line and don't need this feature at all.

I have given extra star only because of the Flipkart delivery system. They are best at handling fragile items. Same day installation was another surprise and the folks were super professional. This shows that brands are now taking Indian market seriously and know that good customer service will go long way.
Used for a week. till now great experience. Good quality Pic. Sound is OK. Within the price range one of the best item you can get. will update after some more months

Mi TV 43 inch 4X Ultra HD 4K LED TV is the best value for money Android TV priced under 30000 rupees. Its build quality is very very good. The picture quality is top notch and even the sound output is loud and very clear. All latest apps are supported and works very smoothly. Google assistant built in the remote is very useful and works perfectly fine. Thanks to flipkart for super quick delivery and installation of the TV. Very happy with this purchase.

Everything is Best.
The Delivery, and the installation was done on the day of delivery with in hours which was the best thing happened.
The Installation guy was very good with the knowledge about the television.
The only con I've observed was the Casting.
Casting is not good. Hope it can be solved with proper system update.
And also Casting is working only when phone and tv connected to same WiFi which is not happened in other popular brands.
Casting connectivity totally cuts that 1 star rating.
Overall the picture quality,sound and performance is the best in this price point. I do recommend this TV to who ever wants to buy it.

Best Image Quality In Best Prize Range , MI beats them All , Super Fast Connectivity , Smooth Experience , Timely And Politely Delivered With Proper Installation process , Definately Great Experience 😊

sound quality was not managed properly when ever the action sequences comes speaker sound raise automatically too loud it's too irretating

Bluetooth available but it won't connect external device like our Android mobile, wireless bluetooth headset etc

after the 9 pie update screen mirroring not working

but another wise picture quality was too good at this price range

Using the product for couple of weeks. So far satisfied. It is very good value for the money however there are technical glitches and you would find tough if you are not so tech savvy... Some points worth to note, there is No background data saver option as advertised ; tv remote stopped working (power button) after (probably) a automatic software update. I had to factory reset to recover my remote power button. Patch wall is just a launcher (like what you see in your smartphone) all the pre installed app needs paid subscription (except you tube) so amount of free content is only in the advertisement.. This tv doesn't come with wall mount accessories.. Flip cart service took 500 to get the wall mount.. Tv panel is not fps like high end tvs... And don't expect the quality as Sony /Samsung /LG. However if you are not so sure and don't want to invest much on TV, then this is the option you may go for.. <25k for an uhd 43 inch is no brainer.. You simply can't beat this price and go wrong..

I had high expectations about the product due to high media hype about it by MI as well as by users. Total value for money. Set up was straight forward and very easy given that I have an android phone. UI is great and easy to navigate. Remote is simple and works perfect. Sound could have been better.

REVIEW AFTER TWO WEEKS:

1. DISPLAY:
Pretty good display (with decent colour accuracy) at this price.
Viewing angles are not great. Colours change when we slightly shift our direction.

2. SOUND:
Clear and crisp (Thanks to Dolby).
But there's not much bass in it.

3. CONNECTIVITY:
WiFi connectivity is decent. It switches off sometimes, especially in case of poor internet connection.

4. SMOOTHNESS:
With 2GB of RAM, it manages everything perfectly. There are not much lags.

So, if you are looking for a 43" 4K Android TV with a decent display and good sound quality (with less bass), then it is a Go-To- Buy!

Overall I am happy with my new MI 4x 43 inches TV, and I am writing my experience here:

1. 4K and HD quality works excellent with this TV.
2. In most of other user reviews I seen they mentioned about TV Audio quality is not up to mark. however i analysed this point very closely and found, Sound is Good and audible clearly, but sound quality going UP/Down on the basis of applications from where you run the your audio/video song.
3. There are no in-built voltage stabilize, you should have to buy it, if light fluctuation in your area.
4. During installation, my Jeeves’s representative told me, if we don't install voltage stabilizer at the time of installation, we don't cover warrant of TV if something happened due to voltage fluctuation. I didn't get reply over this from Flip cart till now, will update you guys, and once get any update on this.
5. Quality of stand is not up to mark, seems very low quality.
6. For wall mount you don't need to pay any extra penny to Jeeves person, as it’s already free. Only you have to pay INR 500, if you purchased wall mount from that person.
7. There are no option to mute audio, which I think MI missed. There should be mute option at report.
8. Build quality is low, if you touch corner of TV, you found some gap.
9. SD channels is display is not good, you could found better experience with at least 780 Resolution video.
10. Screen mirroring option is available with this TV and working fine.
11. Up time is little bit high as compared to other branded TVs like Samsung and Sony
12. No Lag to play video, if you have good internet speed. you should have at least 20 mbps speed to watch 4k videos
13. It hang, you give multiple command through Google Assistance. else, Google assistance work flawless.
14. Approx. 4.4 GB space available to use initially.
15. They mentioned it have HDR 10, I don't think it have, however picture quality is good.
16. In dark screen, picture quality get little bit down, I don't think it have more than 200 - 250 nits brightness

Writing this review after 1 day, I am fully satisfied with this Mi 4x 43" TV. I got delivered this TV on 10th day as flipkart already said while placing the order. After delivery installation and demo done by Jeeves on next day in a very good manner. I want to wall mount the TV, so service engineer brings a good quality of metallic wall mount stand with him and I pay him 500 rs. After installation, I got an update of 875 MB & got new Miracast app for direct casting which is too good. If you want Miracast app for direct casting then you should go for the update. Wireless Connectivity is very good,there are no any problems faced. Picture quality 4/5, Sound quality 4/5, Connectivity 5/5. All the functions and features ie. Google Chromecast are working properly. I am not faced any problems. Remote working fine. USB ports, headphone jack and HDMI ports are working properly. SPDIF ports are not tested yet.But I don't think there will be any problems which will be I facing. HDMI 1 port I am using for my Tata Sky dish which is working fine. HD channels are very good to see. HD Channels 5/5, SD Channels 4/5. Viewing angle only from straight is very very good but from left and right is bad, picture quality turns in little bit whiteness. But it will not affect too much.
From my opinion, you should definitely go for this TV. In this price this is very good TV. Calling and messaging by flipkart,delivery boy and installation boy is very good.
This is a good product... Sound is good.. everything is perfectly fine... If you have any plan to buy this product, then go ahead.. trust me it's a good television.

Excellent customer service from Flipkart. The television is really worth for the price i paid. But

Awesome product at this low price ! You can't expect better !
Pros
Picture quality
Sound clarity
USB and hdmi ports
App support

Cons
Connectivity..
And that's it.
Once you connect via Miracast, suddenly tv will hang. But if you exit and redo the same , it will get established. But, this is a minor issue , in view of the price and other advantages.
Few reviews mentioned the discomfort with the location of USB port, if wall mount is used. But for me it didn't seem so. You can easily reach to the USB ports with (with average sized forearm!) or better to use an extension cable.
Volume can't be increased more , so if you are a high volume lover , go with additional sound bar. You will love it...

Overall, it's just a beauty ! Price worthy and value for money ! Go for it.. I am updating it after one month of use .
It doesn't have any optical port. All are HDMI ports which is a problem as it doesn't help with older systems.

Best TV EVER (mi 4X 65 inch), My review after 6 months of usage.
Picture: Best, HDR quality 4k, better than any other big brand tv.

Sound: Good for most people, bad for my taste, I like much rich, deep bass sound, having capability of producing theatre like sound. So I don't like built in speaker sound. So I got f&d 3800x 5.1, put 2 surround rear speakers on my bed side tables and OMG, NOW I have got theatre like sound experience with this tv.

Connectivity: Awesome, chromecast works flawlessly, bluetooth supports wireless earphones, data saver is good.

For Gaming: I use PS4 Pro, It supports 4k with HDR on PS4 too!!!

Motion smoothening: it's awesome, makes your low frame video look like high frame one. Awesome for 30fps games, feels like 60 while motion smoothness is on.

Best TV EVER

Hi am posting this detailed review after using it for 1 week
1. picture quality is awesome, 4k plays very smooth, unfortunately, there is no much 4k content available
2. connectivity is good, no issues, still am surprised why so many people complained about connectivity
3. there is no issue in casting it will get cast just in seconds, use miracast app. I read several people has issue with casting, I suggest all use miracast app
4. sound quality is good bass needs some improvement but still its good at this price range, Dolby sound is really good to make sure you are playing Dolby enabled content, youtube mostly plays stereo sound try to play content on Hotstar or prime video to experience true Dolby effect.
5. Google data saver is really awesome which reduces the data usage and shows the data alert
6.everything is perfect, I dint find any con's at the price level, overall good buy,
7. installation was done the same day of delivery, additional 500 has to be paid for wall mount
8.This tv isn't displayed in any of the Tv showrooms, if this tv kept for compression no other brand tv's would sell, Tx to Mi
9. Thanks for making it till the end, Good ahead and purchase it

Excellent product and value for money. Have been using it for over a month.
However some con points for me are
1. When you switch off the TV it directly goes into shutdown mode and restarting again takes 20-25 Sec. There should be an in-between step of switching off the screen. My earlier VU TV had this.
2. There is no mute button on the remote and you need to reduce the volume completely to mute it.
3. Due to extreme picture resolution the literature content on the TV is too small.
Eyes are strained(Some of the foreign languages subtitles on Netflix and Hotstar.)
4. Some setting issue for me when watching 4K video on Netflix. Overall screen seems to be dull especially when viewed during day time.Tried manual settings , but not much improvement.

Otherwise. Good to go

Everything is good but, Three cons are there.
1. Wifi connectivity : it sometimes doesn't work i.e even if we connect an wifi network it says no internet and stops working.

As of now this TV looks good. picture quality is quite good. sound quality is decent or OK. Remote and TV build quality is good. Connectivity is bit slow. TV reboot takes about 1 minute. All communication ports are given on RHS of TV panel. TV installation was quick and scheduled very next day of delivery.
There is no optical output port given in this TV, which is very big disappointment. Also only TV power cable comes with this TV. No other cables or wall mount bracket is supplied in the box. TV Remote comes without battery (keep 2 nos. AAA battery ready with you before installation guy comes at your doorstep) . Mi tried to cut every single penny they could save.
There is nothing very fantastic about this TV, which could give edge over other brands, but Overall this TV looks good deal for me.
Also buying 3yr TV protection will ensure which-ever brand you choose, will survive for at least next 3 years.
I dont think brand name matters these days. Better to go for best price deal with additional TV protection plan.

Bought 65inch tv. Picture quality is good dont compare with Sony but you get satisfaction for the money that you paid for this large tv. Sound is good but connect with a sound bar to get cinematic experience. Remote is basic with dedicated Netflix and Prime video buttons. Viewing angles are ok but when you watch the tv from sitting on ground or lying over couch you will notice that the black is not true black.

The only pain after buying this tv is accessing the ports. You cant reach the ports if you did the wall mount. Hdmi ARC sometimes work other Times it wont. So I tried to connect my sound bar through optical cable but that port is not at all accessible, so I connected sound bar to Set up box. Sound modes are preset no much change you can notice even with tuning those. Written as TruHD and Dolby sound compatible but it sounds like some normal speakers. Over all a budget tv for those who wants a large screen in their house.

If you are looking for a large screen tv that too with low budget go for it.

At first blush, it seems like you get a lot for the money. However, its got a lot of bugs which detracts from the entire viewing experience and ultimately mars it down as a product. First off, the HDR performance is terrible. It is an HDR TV only for namesake. Second, there are 4 horizontal lines visible on the panel whenever it is displaying solid colours. the lines are very faint but noticeable and once you seem them, its difficult to unsee and becomes a constant irritant. Third off, the backlight is erratic as the top half refuses to switch on and requires multiple restarts of the TV set before it starts working.
It's very very good casting also working perfectly. Iam giving this review after using 2 weeks. It's Just awesome. But There is no Google and chrome Browser in The TV.

Reviewing after two months of active usage. Definitely a good upgrade over my TCL Full HD..Blacks are not as dark as Samsung VA monitor..Color vividness is little less when viewed from side angles. Android OS takes a bit time to load up on starting up but works pretty fast once loaded. Does not allow to change picture and sound settings while viewing online content and everytime have to come on to the home screen to make any changes..that's more of a drawback for Android OS.. Sound quality is decent and can get loud enough for a mid size drawing room..Vocal clarity and mids are sharp..bass is low as expected from a TV..got a Panasonic Soundbar for better sound.. Configuring HDMI Arc is a little tricky on this and could not detect the soundbar at multiple attempts using different HDMI cables.. Finally got one cable to work with HDMI Arc functionality.. For HDMI Arc functionality try using these steps: detach all HDMI cables and turn off both TV and soundbar and also remove from main power supply..keep them shut for more than a minute..now plug in both ends of HDMI cable with soundbar and TV...turn on TV first and then soundbar..if lucky HDMI Arc would work!

Picture:- 4/5. Colours cool quite good but the crispness to be wow is left.but in this price very well done.

Sound:- 4/5. Pretty decent in low volume, sound is good. in high it's ok but the Bass and clearty of different tones is not available.but in this price it's decent.

OS:- 4/5. The OS takes exactly 55 seconds to load.the patchwall looks good and easy navigation.

App:- Netflix, Primevideo, YouTube preloaded and rest app you can load from playstore.

Connectivity:- is good. Mi remote is quick responsive. along with remote I was able to connect bluetooth headphone without any problem.

Installation:- installation person came same day after delivery. Mi doesn't give wall mount so had to purchase from him at price of Rs 850/. Other than that no money for installation.

Most detailed review

--- A could not be better product at the price point for sure ---

Its an LCD pannel with LED backlight and hence it's heavy on power consumption, 105W, which is pretty high for day to day use of a TV. One should try to get a TV with LED pannel in order to stay energy and bill concious. Picture quality is unquestionable. Plays 4K videos like a charm and seamlessly, if your internet is fast enough of course. Sound is decent, not something worth a special mention. No bass at all, neither expected. WiFi connectivity range for this device is just as good as modern day mobile phones, compared to even normal laptops the WiFi connectivity range is much worse. Bluetooth connectivity range is just as normal. I have experienced few small lags, not too frequently. One bug is that while operating with voice command sometimes the TV sound stops to work completely and that is truly annoying. You will have to restart the TV to get going again. Slowness in operation while working with Google assistant is quite noticeable, and not because of internet speed.

OS, UI & user-friendlyness:

Mi Patchwall home screen looks charming but I wish it could be more useful like when it comes to switching between apps there should be a button available on the remote to toggle between all running apps at the time like the case in Android smartphones. But truly thats a feature missing in the OS not in this specific TV or Patchwall. Also the recently viewed items section could be very helpful if not for the fact that it does not bring recent items from all the apps, like in my case it only shows the items watched in Hotstar. Also some apps take much longer to load than others like Hotstar is superfast where as Prime Video takes a while. Google assistant and voice search are useful, differently with different apps. Like with YouTube you will not be needing a keyboard ever, the voice search is ok there but with other apps, you can open the app with voice command, but not really search anything within it using voice search. And it's quite silly and weird if you have to type with a remote. This last point need no concern if everytime you cast content from your phone. Built in Chromecast is just awesome. Also using Miracast you
can clone you smartphone's screen on the TV which provides great flexibility.

Verdict:

If you are excited with the concept of Android TV(my case exactly) and on a tight budget also looking for experiencing true 4K, then this the product for you. The trade off is in terns of energy inefficiency and small lags here and there. If your looking for uncompromised quality and performance, well do more research.

Definitely a great purchase. For it's price, it's a good deal. Flipkart delivery was prompt. The product was delivered and installed in the same day.

Now for the product,

Pros:
1. Picture quality is brilliant for the price
2. Easy to use
3. Connectivity is good: As people have called out, yes there were initially issues with wifi disconnecting but it gets resolved once you switch to Developer mode (Youtube it!). It's very easy to resolve
4. Netflix, Prime, Hotstar, YouTube, Spotify, TVF Play, Voot, Zee5 work smoothly (Didn't try, nor ever trying ALT Balaji)

Cons:
1. Volume control is not very good. You have to keep the remote handy if you're watching an action movie to switch between action and dialogue heavy sequences
2. Mute button would be a great help
3. In-built media players do not support subtitles if you're playing a media file through hard disk. You can download VLC or Mx Player but those apps are pretty buggy. They serve the makeshift purpose though
4. Bit of an issue with Chromecast connectivity

All in all, I would highly recommend this as a bedroom TV or if you have a smaller living room.

Reviewing after 10 days of usage.

Delivery was on time and installation was done within 2 hours of the delivery by jeves services (more than 5 star for it😀).

Display is excellent, even 480p videos on youtube is clearer. Played 1280x544 resolution movie by pendrive which also gives more than what was expected. 4k is also excellent and gives crystal clear viewing experience. Overall, if video has 480p or above resolution, then it is going to be a good experience.

Sound quality is ok. Bass is medium. Sound level is good enough for 400 sq ft room.

With connectivity, there is one issue (not a major one), you can plug 2 pendrive simultaneously only if pendrive is slim like traditional sandisk or hp pendrive which comes in metal. It is due to the place of port is at same site.

❎❎❎ Do not open tv yourself after delivery otherwise tv warranty will be void. Only authorised installation person can open it.

Patchwall is good. Navigation is smooth in 95 percent cases. Other issue is with chromecast. You can play youtube, google photos etc easily if your phone is compatible. If your phone supports miracast or mirrorshare then it is going to a problem but it can be removed with the help of some other apps (go to youtube). Now it is all ok with new update.

Built quality is good. Main plug wire has enough length. Looks good. Bezzels is ok. Remote is smaller which is good but it has no youtube button.



Overall, i think it is a tv with 4.5 out of 5 star. Go for it.

Most probably, the MI TV 4X 43 inch is having VA Panel. There is no way to find out whether it is IPS/VA, at least from the Menu. The display is very good, except for the light bleeding in complete dark area or scene. This will not affect your viewing experience. User interface especially menu is a bit tricky. One useful feature is it remembers the last input source. So if you are watching TATASKY-->Switch off --> Switch On -- The source last played will be selected by default. HDMI ARC is working fine, but getting the ARC through the Yamaha Receiver (HTR3067) was a herculean task. Android TV is good. Prime Video starts and plays without any hiccup from the Remote. I have got it on the first day sale for Rs.24000/- (ICICI BANK OFFER). The TV is total value for the money. Esp 4K HDR 43 inch display at this price with reasonably good build quality is excellent. Reduced one star because of the basic remote (No mute button). If you switch off from Remote, the TV shuts down (No standby) and restarts from the scratch if you switch on again. I heard that the you can take it to standby mode through voice command, yet to test that part.

But very important feature is Google-chrome cast but in MI 4x-pro it not comes with the product it self . If anyone knows how to install mira-cast then what to do
If you are looking for a budget product with very few compromises, you should definitely consider this. No complaints in 4 months of usage.
Good. Chromecast and screen mirror working fine after second system update in tv. Thank you MI . Value for money

This is one hell of a TV. I mean it looks gorgeous, performs flawlessly. What more could a person need or want. Videos and Games in 4K are an absolute delight to watch. I mean they look absolutely gorgeous. Installation happened the same day as delivery for me in Bangalore. The extra money was paid for a flexible wall mount - Around 4K, but if you are thinking why so costly then think of the convenience too. The remote is a straight copy of the prime stick with extra features. It has a voice assistance button, 1 netflix and 1 prime hot keys. Chromecast works without a hitch and i connected my Raspberry pi via the HDMI and turned the TV into a giant monitor for coding. The possibilities are endless. I tried so hard to find cons in this product but seriously there are none. I have 2 more smart TVs - One from Micromax and another from BPL. Both gave me minor issues, but the Mi TV is on another level.
